The title refers to a remark repeated by Ian Gillan of Deep Purple on their Made in Japan live album: "Could we have everything louder than everything else?". Recorded at a show in Hamburg, Germany on May 21, 1998. Everything Louder than Everyone Else is produced 'undubbed' in a two disc format.
